column1: Kata Robata////   He sold us on one of their limited items
column2: which was just awesome.  Then he talked us into just about all the usual favorites of Nigiri sushi.  My friend
column4: was enticed by the waiter's explanation of their spiciest roll.  Everything that came out on a plate
column5: we ate and enjoyed.  I felt as though the waiter was a manager or the owner even
column6: because his knowledge of the food ...and sake was impeccable.  I hope he doesn't go anywhere
column7: because part of the reason I'm coming back is his service.  Put it to you this way
column8: he was so interesting when he described the food that the chef would stand there smiling and listening along with us.  Maybe he was the owner
column9: I don't know...I just know he added to our dining experience.
